author: jonl
msg: Made a number of small refactoring changes to support url path encryption.
The code is not that far from working, but the feature is turned off.  Added
a method Session.getPathCrypt() to get an instance of ICrypt for encrypting
url paths for a given session (it's probably not a good idea in general to
encrypt all paths for an application with the same key).  Moved ICrypt and
related implementations to wicket.util.crypt since the usage is more general
now.  Made a first pass at url encoding that doesn't work when path encryption
is enabled.  Also made a first pass at url decoding/reparsing that doesn't
quite work either.  If someone out there has the time to fix my implementation
(I don't think it's too far off), we could probably ship this with 1.0.

author: ehillenius
msg: unfortunatly, this patch doesn't fix the unicode problem, but it seems like a good idea to include this header.
